name: 4 TRAVELLERS - Play Spanish
synopsis: 4 TRAVELLERS can be played alone or together with friends and at the same time teach you new words in Spanish. The game is suitable for both young and old, and no previous knowledge is necessary. The more you play the more your Spanish vocabulary increases. You can also play and learn with the game's unique learning mode. • Listen to pronunciations. • Collect medals or win achievements. • Monitor your language skills development with up to 3 other players. The game is perfect to bring on your trip, and over 240 carefully selected words are included specifically for this occasion.
